segments.text: I gaze upon this indoor kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman in an apron dries a dish by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is intense, towel bunched around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water overflows from the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It pours onto the floor, creating a hazardous wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, unaware of the danger at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinets reveal a tempting cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool, reaching eagerly inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool sways, threatening to topple him down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand for balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below pleads with an open palm for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secretive adventure seems thrilling to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the neat garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such peace outside, while turmoil brews within these walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for these oblivious souls.
segments.speaker: PAR
